    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addSubQuestions(java.util.ArrayList<Question> questions)
      add subquestions as an array. only matrix questions have subquestions and thea are always CheckBoxQuestions However, you can add any kind of questions, the viausalization at this point just does not support that at all...
      java.util.ArrayList<Answer> getAnswers()
      Retuns all the answers of a question, answers may have subansers or contingient questions depending on the type of answer

      returns the ID of a question (may be blank in many cases)

      returns the section text The section text is the Text of the section the question appears in

    • Constructor Detail

      • Question

        public Question(java.lang.String sectionText,
        java.lang.String id,
        java.lang.String text,
        java.util.ArrayList<Answer> answers,
        boolean randomize)
        Question is a Question in a Questionnaire. SectionText is the Text of the section in which this question appears The id is a singlar id for the question the text
        Parameters:
        sectionText - the text of the section the question appers in
        id - an ID
        text - the question itself
        answers - an arraylist of answers
        randomize - the information of the answers are supposed to be displayed randomized

    • Method Detail

      • numberOfQuestionsAndSubquestions

        public int numberOfQuestionsAndSubquestions()
        returns the number of questions including subquestions if it is a matrix question
        Returns:
        number of questions as int (1 if this is not a matrix question)

      • addSubQuestions

        public void addSubQuestions(java.util.ArrayList<Question> questions)
        add subquestions as an array. only matrix questions have subquestions and thea are always CheckBoxQuestions However, you can add any kind of questions, the viausalization at this point just does not support that at all... (I have no idea what is going to happen)
        Parameters:
        questions -
